meanings.definition: A machine used to clear snow from driveways and sidewalks.
meanings.sent1: My neighbor's snowblower is very loud.
meanings.sent2: I borrowed a snowblower to clear my driveway.
meanings.sent3: The snowblower hummed as it ate up the snow.
meanings.sent4: The snowblower was a roaring beast, devouring the snow in its path.
meanings.sent5: The snowblower's blades spun quickly, throwing snow in all directions.

meanings.definition: The act of using a snowblower to remove snow.
meanings.sent1: I finished the snowblower job in no time.
meanings.sent2: After the snowfall, I had to do some snowblower work.
meanings.sent3: The snowblower dance involved a lot of back and forth.
meanings.sent4: The snowblower's song echoed through the quiet neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The snowblower's rhythm matched the falling snowflakes.

meanings.definition: A person who operates a snowblower.
meanings.sent1: The snowblower operator cleared the path efficiently.
meanings.sent2: My dad is the designated snowblower in our family.
meanings.sent3: The snowblower whisperer tamed the wild machine.
meanings.sent4: The snowblower conductor orchestrated the snow-clearing symphony.
meanings.sent5: The snowblower master maneuvered the machine with ease.
